thread.title: Kentucky, North Carolina tied at No. 1 in pre-season coaches' poll
thread.title_full: Kentucky, North Carolina tied at No. 1 in pre-season coaches' poll

author: jtipton@herald-leader.com (Jerry Tipton)
title: Kentucky, North Carolina tied at No. 1 in pre-season coaches' poll
text:
Kentucky, North Carolina tied at No. 1 in pre-season coaches' poll By Jerry Tipton Order a reprint of this story 
For the third straight year, Kentucky will go into a season ranked No. 1 in the USA Today Coaches' Poll. 
UK and North Carolina tied for the top spot this year, it was announced Thursday. Both teams had 749 points in the balloting by 32 Division I coaches. North Carolina had 12 first-place votes, while Kentucky had 11. 
Kentucky, which has a 63-5 record as the No. 1 team in John Calipari's six seasons as coach, was also the pre-season No. 1 the past two seasons. UK was ranked No. 1 throughout last season, and finished No. 3 after a Final Four loss to Wisconsin. 
Of course, Kentucky went from pre-season No. 1 to the Final Four in each of the last two seasons. 
Kentucky will play four teams ranked in the coaches' pre-season top 25: No. 4 Duke, No. 5 Kansas, No. 19 LSU and No. 20 Vanderbilt. 
USA TODAY COACHES POLL 
The top 25 teams in the USA Today men's preseason college basketball poll, with first-place votes in parentheses, final 2014-15 records, points based on 25 points for a first-place vote through one point for a 25th-place vote and final 2014-15 ranking:

1. North Carolina (12) 26-12 749 12 
1. Kentucky (11) 38-1 749 3 
3. Maryland (5) 28-7 723 16 
4. Duke (3) 35-4 686 1 
5. Kansas (1) 27-9 675 17 
6. Virginia 30-4 667 8 
7. Iowa State 25-9 541 19 
8. Oklahoma 24-11 520 13 
9. Villanova 33-3 498 9 
10. Arizona 34-4 477 4 
11. Gonzaga 35-3 468 6 
12. Wichita State 30-5 461 11 
13. Michigan State 27-12 386 7 
14. California 18-15 350 —

17. Wisconsin 36-4 181 2 
18. Notre Dame 32-6 172 5 
19. LSU 22-11 163 — 
21. Baylor 24-10 145 21 
22. Butler 23-11 132 23 
23. West Virginia 25-10 125 18 
24. Connecticut 20-15 110 — 
24. Purdue 21-13 110 — 
Others receiving votes: Michigan 108, Louisville 93, Texas A&M 58, UCLA 48, Georgetown 45, Cincinnati 43, North Carolina State 36, Oregon 33, Texas 29, Florida State 25, Xavier 25, Miami 11, San Diego State 10, Iowa 8, Boise State 5, Davidson 5, Providence 5, Belmont 2, Ohio State 2, Stephen F. Austin 2, Dayton 1, Marquette 1, Old Dominion 1, Tulsa 1. Jerry Tipton: (859) 231-3227. Twitter: @JerryTipton. Blog: ukbasketball.bloginky.com.
